# Haunting Tune (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]], [[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One creature/level, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 110

*The spell wrapped within your music makes even the most hard-hearted quail.*

Targets that fail their saves become [[Shaken|shaken]].
